item.description:
Hi All....

Toro in the South End is where one of the city's most acclaimed chefs provides the city of Boston with an edgy, foodie take on a modern tapas bar. Toro is one of the most raved about places in all of the city and so it has won many of Best of Boston awards, including... one of Boston's Trendiest venues and Bar Scenes.

Time:

6:30PM

At:

Toro Restaurant
www.toro-restaurant.com

1704 Washington St
Boston, MA 02118
(617) 536-4300

Please come and join me for wine and/or for very delicious/creative drinks!

Hope to see you there...

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Tapas at Toro - One of the city's most acclaimed Chefs and Tapas Bar
